entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers. Wet flurries over higher terrain early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon except 40 over exposed coastal sections. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 40 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 40 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
